member.name: T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HexUtil
member.summary: Contains helpers for dealing with byte-hex char conversions.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HexUtil.UInt32LsbToHexDigit(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts a number 0 - 15 to its associated hex character '0' - 'F'.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HexUtil.Int32LsbToHexDigit(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a number 0 - 15 to its associated hex character '0' - 'F'.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HexUtil.ByteToHexDigits(System.Byte,System.Char@,System.Char@)
member.summary: Gets the uppercase hex-encoded form of a byte.

member.name: T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HtmlEncoder
member.summary: Represents a type used to do HTML encoding.

member.name: P:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HtmlEncoder.Default
member.summary: Returns a default built-in instance of .

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HtmlEncoder.Create(System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of HtmlEncoder with provided settings.
member.param: Settings used to control how the created encodes, primarily which characters to encode.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.HtmlEncoder.Create(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Creates a new instance of HtmlEncoder specifying character to be encoded.
member.param: Set of characters that the encoder is allowed to not encode.
member.remarks: Some characters in might still get encoded, i.e. this parameter is just telling the encoder what ranges it is allowed to not encode, not what characters it must not encode.

member.name: T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.JavaScriptEncoder
member.summary: Represents a type used to do JavaScript encoding/escaping.

member.name: P:System.Text.Encodings.Web.JavaScriptEncoder.Default
member.summary: Returns a default built-in instance of .

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.JavaScriptEncoder.Create(System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of JavaScriptEncoder with provided settings.
member.param: Settings used to control how the created encodes, primarily which characters to encode.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.JavaScriptEncoder.Create(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Creates a new instance of JavaScriptEncoder specifying character to be encoded.
member.param: Set of characters that the encoder is allowed to not encode.
member.remarks: Some characters in might still get encoded, i.e. this parameter is just telling the encoder what ranges it is allowed to not encode, not what characters it must not encode.

member.name: T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder
member.summary: An abstraction representing various text encoders.
member.remarks: TextEncoder subclasses can be used to do HTML encoding, URI encoding, and JavaScript encoding. Instances of such subclasses can be accessed using , , and .

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.TryEncodeUnicodeScalar(System.Int32,System.Char*,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Encodes a Unicode scalar into a buffer.
member.param: Unicode scalar.
The destination of the encoded text.
Length of the destination in chars.
Number of characters written to the .
member.returns: Returns false if is too small to fit the encoded text, otherwise returns true.
member.remarks: This method is seldom called directly. One of the TextEncoder.Encode overloads should be used instead. Implementations of need to be thread safe and stateless.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.FindFirstCharacterToEncode(System.Char*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds index of the first character that needs to be encoded.
member.param: The text buffer to search.
The number of characters in the .
member.remarks: This method is seldom called directly. It's used by higher level helper APIs.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.WillEncode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if a given Unicode scalar will be encoded.
member.param: Unicode scalar.
member.returns: Returns true if the will be encoded by this encoder, otherwise returns false.

member.name: P:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.MaxOutputCharactersPerInputCharacter
member.summary: Maximum number of characters that this encoder can generate for each input character.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.Encode(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes the supplied string and returns the encoded text as a new string.
member.param: String to encode.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.Encode(System.IO.TextWriter,System.String)
member.summary: Encodes the supplied string into a .
member.param: Encoded text is written to this output.
String to be encoded.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.Encode(System.IO.TextWriter,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes a substring into a .
member.param: Encoded text is written to this output.
String whose substring is to be encoded.
The index where the substring starts.
Number of characters in the substring.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.Encode(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes characters from an array into a .
member.param: Encoded text is written to the output.
Array of characters to be encoded.
The index where the substring starts.
Number of characters in the substring.

member.name: T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings
member.summary: Represents a filter which allows only certain Unicode code points through.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates an empty filter (allows no code points through by default).

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.#ctor(System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings)
member.summary: Instantiates the filter by cloning the allow list of another .

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.#ctor(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Instantiates the filter where only the character ranges specified by are allowed by the filter.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.AllowCharacter(System.Char)
member.summary: Allows the character specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.AllowCharacters(System.Char[])
member.summary: Allows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.AllowCodePoints(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Allows all code points specified by .

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.AllowRange(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange)
member.summary: Allows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.AllowRanges(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Allows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.Clear
member.summary: Resets this settings object by disallowing all characters.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.ForbidCharacter(System.Char)
member.summary: Disallows the character through the filter.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.ForbidCharacters(System.Char[])
member.summary: Disallows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.ForbidRange(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange)
member.summary: Disallows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.ForbidRanges(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Disallows all characters specified by through the filter.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.GetAllowedCharacters
member.summary: Retrieves the bitmap of allowed characters from this settings object. The returned bitmap is a clone of the original bitmap to avoid unintentional modification.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings.GetAllowedCodePoints
member.summary: Gets an enumeration of all allowed code points.

member.name: T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.UrlEncoder
member.summary: Represents a type used to do URL encoding.

member.summary: Returns a default built-in instance of .

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.UrlEncoder.Create(System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of UrlEncoder with provided settings.
member.param: Settings used to control how the created encodes, primarily which characters to encode.

member.name: M:System.Text.Encodings.Web.UrlEncoder.Create(System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange[])
member.summary: Creates a new instance of UrlEncoder specifying character to be encoded.
member.param: Set of characters that the encoder is allowed to not encode.

member.name: T:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeHelpers
member.summary: Contains helpers for dealing with Unicode code points.

member.name: F:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeHelpers.UNICODE_REPLACEMENT_CHAR
member.summary: Used for invalid Unicode sequences or other unrepresentable values.

member.name: F:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeHelpers.UNICODE_LAST_CODEPOINT
member.summary: The last code point defined by the Unicode specification.

member.name: M:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeHelpers.CreateDefinedCharacterBitmap
member.summary: Helper method which creates a bitmap of all characters which are defined per the Unicode specification.

member.name: M:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeHelpers.GetDefinedCharacterBitmap
member.summary: Returns a bitmap of all characters which are defined per version 7.0.0 of the Unicode specification.

member.name: M:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeHelpers.GetScalarValueFromUtf16(System.Char,System.Nullable{System.Char},System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Given a UTF-16 character stream, reads the next scalar value from the stream. Set 'endOfString' to true if 'pChar' points to the last character in the stream.

member.name: M:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeHelpers.GetScalarValueFromUtf16(System.Char*,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Given a UTF-16 character stream, reads the next scalar value from the stream. Set 'endOfString' to true if 'pChar' points to the last character in the stream.

member.name: M:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeHelpers.GetUtf8RepresentationForScalarValue(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Given a Unicode scalar value, returns the UTF-8 representation of the value. The return value's bytes should be popped from the LSB.

member.name: M:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeHelpers.IsCharacterDefined(System.Char)
member.summary: Returns a value stating whether a character is defined per version 7.0.0 of the Unicode specification. Certain classes of characters (control chars, private use, surrogates, some whitespace) are considered "undefined" for our purposes.

member.name: M:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeHelpers.IsSupplementaryCodePoint(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the given scalar value is in the supplementary plane and thus requires 2 characters to be represented in UTF-16 (as a surrogate pair).

member.name: T:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange
member.summary: Represents a contiguous range of Unicode code points.
member.remarks: Currently only the Basic Multilingual Plane is supported.

member.name: M:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new .
member.param: The first code point in the range.
The number of code points in the range.

member.name: P:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange.FirstCodePoint
member.summary: The first code point in this range.

member.name: P:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange.Length
member.summary: The number of code points in this range.

member.name: M:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRange.Create(System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Creates a new from a span of characters.
member.param: The first character in the range.
The last character in the range.

member.name: T:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRanges
member.summary: Contains predefined instances which correspond to blocks from the Unicode 7.0 specification.

member.name: P:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRanges.None
member.summary: An empty . This range contains no code points.

member.name: P:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRanges.All
member.summary: A which contains all characters in the Unicode Basic Multilingual Plane (U+0000..U+FFFF).

member.name: P:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRanges.BasicLatin
member.summary: A corresponding to the 'Basic Latin' Unicode block (U+0000..U+007F).
member.remarks: See http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf for the full set of characters in this block.

member.name: P:System.Text.Unicode.UnicodeRanges.Latin1Supplement
member.summary: A corresponding to the 'Latin-1 Supplement' Unicode block (U+0080..U+00FF).
member.remarks: See http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0080.pdf for the full set of characters in this block.
